create table if not exists admin ( id int8 generated by default as identity, username varchar(255), primary key (id) ); create table if not exists client ( id int8 generated by default as identity, username varchar(255), amount int8, disable boolean not null default false, primary key (id) ); create table if not exists goods ( id int8 generated by default as identity, count int8, name varchar(255), price int8, primary key (id) );
insert into admin (username) values ('myadmin'), ('robot_h'); insert into client (username, amount) values ('myclient', 10000), ('h', 10000); insert into goods (name, price, count) values ('Laptop Acer Nitro 5', 399, 5), ('Computer Mouse', 9, 50), ('Table Oak', 19, 20), ('Chair Oak', 9, 130), ('Smartphone Redmi Note 8T', 199, 13), ('Smartphone Redmi Note 9', 149, 16), ('Smartphone Redmi Note 10', 249, 10);
